Generation V.Black: The sound of Sawk punching boulders and trees can be heard all the way from the mountains where they train.
Generation V.White: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.
Generation V.Black 2: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
Generation V.White 2: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.

Generation VI.X: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
Generation VI.Y: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.

Generation VIII.Sword: If you see a Sawk training in the mountains in its single-minded pursuit of strength, it's best to quietly pass by.
Generation VIII.Shield: The karate chops of a Sawk that's trained itself to the limit can cleave the ocean itself.

Generation V.Black: Routes 10 , 15 , and 18 , Pinwheel Forest (outside) ( tall grass )
Generation V.White: Routes 10 , 15 , and 18 , Pinwheel Forest (outside) ( rustling grass )
Generation V.Black 2: Routes 15 , 18 , and 23 , Pinwheel Forest (outside) ( tall grass ) Victory Road ( rustling grass )
Generation V.White 2: Routes 15 , 18 , and 23 , Pinwheel Forest (outside), Victory Road ( rustling grass )

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 8 , Bridge Field , Giant's Mirror , Motostoke Outskirts , Motostoke Riverbank North Lake Miloch , Dusty Bowl ( Max Raid Battle )
